survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Meeting Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and effectiveness with the hybrid meeting tools currently in use within the organization.

questions.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools do you currently use for work?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture all tools used. Ensure 'Other' option includes a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkbox input type for multiple selections. Include an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: Which hybrid meeting tools do you currently use for work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the hybrid meeting tools provided by your organization?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection. Do not randomize options.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the hybrid meeting tools provided by your organization?

questions.question_text: What features do you find most useful in hybrid meeting tools?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key features that enhance productivity.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkbox input type for multiple selections. Include an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: What features do you find most useful in hybrid meeting tools?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using hybrid meeting tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text area input for open-ended responses. Set a max character limit.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using hybrid meeting tools?

questions.question_text: How often do technical issues disrupt your hybrid meetings?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to measure the occurrence of technical issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection. Do not randomize options.
